title: [Massive] Hierarchical Educational Planning Design and Communication Strategy

context.additional_context: Learners study how to design and interpret educational curricula using hierarchical planning models in both face-to-face and online environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design a hierarchical educational plan with three or more levels, from educational objectives to detailed implementation stages, using a hierarchical planning model.
Learners can decompose existing educational plans into upper, middle, and lower levels to identify core elements and customize them.
Learners can analyze the conceptual consistency and feasibility of design proposals through peer assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
